Summary: UFO FLYING TRI ORB, ADVANCED AIRCRAFT
divs: Sighting Detailsthere were helicopters in the sky searching for this object that i caught on video, it flew very fast and i only saw it for a minute. the next day, the police were on the streets in my neighborhood asking strange and weird questions. it was covered up shortly after, its either an alien craft or a top secret military advanced flying object.
